news.title: 特朗普炮轰“史上最差”超级碗中场秀
news.title0: Bad Bunny makes history as Trump criticises 'terrible' Super Bowl show
news.content: 波多黎各说唱歌手坏痞兔在超级碗中场秀全程使用西班牙语表演，创造历史。美国前总统特朗普则猛烈抨击其表演“糟糕透顶”。
news.content0: Bad Bunny's Super Bowl half-time show was one big love letter to his native Puerto Rico,culminating in a message of pride in his home and the Americas, and an appeal for unity with the US.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 威廉凯特首度就爱泼斯坦文件发声
news.title0: William and Catherine say they are 'deeply concerned' in first statement on Epstein revelations
news.content: 威尔士亲王夫妇发表首次公开声明，对爱泼斯坦案最新披露的文件表示“深感关切”，并称其关注点仍在受害者身上。
news.content0: The Prince and Princess of Wales have said they are "deeply concerned" by the latest revelations about Jeffrey Epstein in their first public statement on the scandal.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 美科技公司兴起“996”工作制
news.title0: The tech firms embracing a 72-hour working week
news.content: 为在AI领域抢占先机，美国部分科技初创公司正积极推行每周工作约70小时的“996”文化，引发对员工健康与生产力的担忧。
news.content0: The recruitment website is jazzy, awash with pictures of happy young workers, and festooned with upbeat mini-slogans such as "insane speed", "infinite curiosity" and "customer obsession".
news.author: BBC

news.title: 日本股市因首相大选获胜创历史新高
news.title0: Japanese stocks surge as Takaichi secures historic election victory
news.content: 日本首相高市早苗领导的自民党在众议院选举中取得历史性胜利，日经指数应声大涨，一度突破57000点创下新高。
news.content0: Japanese stocks surged to a record high on Monday, as Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi's Liberal Democratic Party (LDP) basked in a historic election victory.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 韩国官员“进口女性”言论引众怒
news.title0: Outrage as South Korean official suggests 'importing' foreign women to boost birth rate
news.content: 韩国一名地方官员为提振生育率，建议从越南或斯里兰卡“进口年轻女性”，此番言论引发国内外强烈抗议，该官员已被开除党籍。
news.content0: A South Korean official who suggested the country "import young women" from "Vietnam or Sri Lanka" to boost its birth-rate has been expelled from his party.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 全球被弃油轮数量激增，船员处境艰难
news.title0: The shadowy world of abandoned oil tankers
news.content: 过去一年全球被船东遗弃的油轮等商船数量激增，船员面临数月无薪、物资短缺的困境，地缘政治与“影子船队”是主因。
news.content0: Over the past year there has been a big rise in the number of oil tankers and other commercial ships being abandoned around the world by their owners. What is causing the spike? And what is the human impact on the affected merchant sailors?
news.author: BBC

news.title: 土耳其以弗所古城：面积十倍于迪士尼
news.title0: The ancient Roman city 10 times the size of Disneyland
news.content: 土耳其以弗所古城遗址面积约为迪士尼乐园的十倍，去年吸引约250万游客，是保存完好的希腊罗马港口城市遗迹。
news.content0: The security lines at the entrance move with airport-like efficiency. Beyond them, the concrete of the 21st century falls away, replaced by creamy pillars and marble paving stretching into the distance, with green hills beyond.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 刚果（金）戈马市被叛军占领一周年
news.content: 刚果（金）东部城市戈马被M23叛军占领已满一年，当地民众仍在民兵控制下艰难寻求恢复正常生活。
news.content0: One year ago, M23, a rebel militia, violently charged into the city of Goma in the Democratic Republic of Congo and took it over from the government.
news.author: NYTimes

news.title: 科学家复原400年前“吸血鬼”面部
news.title0: Face of a 'vampire' revealed: Science rebuilds likeness of man decapitated after death to stop him coming back
news.content: 考古学家在克罗地亚发现一具被斩首并面朝下埋葬的男性遗骸，推测其为防“吸血鬼”复活所为，科学家现已复原其面部。
news.content0: The face of a "vampire" whose remains were posthumously mutilated to prevent them rising from the dead can be seen for the first time in more than 400 years.
news.author: Sky News
